experiences.title: Full Stack Intern
description: Developed a comprehensive website for IIT Roorkee's Coda Lab, supporting the work of 15-20 lab members.
Admin panel with features for updating, deleting, adding, and editing website content, including functionality for creating and managing admin and sub-admin roles, reducing management time by 50%.
Main Website has various sections, such as News, Events, Research, Publications, individual pages, etc.
Developed a dedicated page for Professor showcasing achievements, publications, research projects, etc.
Technologies Used: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Bootstrap, AWS, Vercel, Git, GitHub.
